scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf lib && rm -rf es-module && rm -rf es-bundle && rm -rf es-bundle-min
scripts.build:commonJS: rm -rf lib && tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir lib
scripts.build:es-module: rm -rf es-module && tsc --module esnext --target es5 --outDir es-module
scripts.build:es-bundle: rm -rf es-bundle && parcel build es-module/index.js --no-minify --experimental-scope-hoisting --out-dir es-bundle dist --global discovery
scripts.build:es-bundle-min: rm -rf es-bundle-min && parcel build es-module/index.js --experimental-scope-hoisting --out-dir es-bundle-min dist --global discovery
scripts.format: yarn run lint:fix && yarn run prettier
